articles.author: Ashish Dangwal
articles.title: 50,000 North Korean Commandos Prepare To Join Russia’s Special Military Ops In Ukraine – Military Correspondent - EurAsian Times
articles.description: North Korea is preparing to send 500,000 soldiers from its armed forces on combat missions in support of Russia’s special military operation in Ukraine, a Russian state TV war correspondent has claimed.  In his youtube video, Aleksander Sladkov, a seasoned Ru…
